attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Change the bases of legal trial from the present Adversarial system to an Inquisitorial legal system. The Adversarial system benefits those who can present their case in whatever way benefits them best. The truth is irrelevant in such a system. the prosecution's case is what matters. 
The adversarial system is the favourite of career criminals as the Jury can be coerced and intimidated by the system. Adversarial Law is a true "Theatre of Criminals"

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
